channel.title: Need to use a proxy to connect to tor
channel.description: I already asked that here before and using the torrc directive doesn't work. Is it possible to make a ProxyVM which will transparently route everything from a vm that's connected to it using a remote ssh server? I want to chain sys-whonix to it.

item.title: Need to use a proxy to connect to tor
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
manuel:

I already asked that here before and using the torrc directive doesn’t work. Is it possible to make a ProxyVM which will transparently route everything from a vm that’s connected to it using a remote ssh server? I want to chain sys-whonix to it.

Possible, quite likely. Documented (or likely being documented anytime
soon), no since it requires non-trivial development work.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to use a proxy to connect to tor
